Articles.Content: Hey is there the server up, i want to play MP this game, can you give me the ip plz

Hey is there the server up, i want to play MP this game, can you give me the ip plz

If you had read the original post, no.

ARM is out.

Well, that'll put a damper on things.
ARM doesn't change any of the mods they all still work fine
We don't even have KMP yet, but people are already debating over modded servers? Me gusta!
Alright guys, qith easter coming up, I'll have a 1-week break from school. That should give me time to set this up
Apparently, they are dropping KMP 0.1.5.2 SoonTM! I will start looking at this again when that happens!
Basically, until I get the damn server. I'll see if I can nag my dad into setting it up

On 1/2/2014 at 6:04 AM, KvickFlygarn87 said:

I'm looking to create two modded KMP servers, focused on long term playability.

A little info

We are running a dual server setup, where one is with PvP and one without. I might start looking at making a peaceful Career mode server, but don't get your hopes up ;-)

Mods:

-Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

-KMP (duh)

-MechJeb

-Kerbal engineer

-KSP Interstellar

-KAS

-RealChute

-Firespitter

-ProcFairings

-Lazor system (no missiles)

-KAC

-EnhancedNavball

-PreciseNode

-Fusebox

-B9

-Active Texture Management

-Kethane

-Extraplanetary launchpads

And the PvP server will also have

-Lazor missiles

-InfiniteDice's aircraft carrier and submarine parts

-AKSTechnologies Weapons pack

-Gatling gun

-TAC Self destruct

Admins

PvP server:

-Me (Head admin)

-Krosulhah (Admin)

-bgraves (Moderator)

Peaceful server:

-Me (Head admin)

-SlenderFan (Head admin)

-Classyjakey (Admin)

What's new?

-I have set up a working web page with URLs to all mods. (I messed up and deleted it, I'll start working on it again as soon as the servers are ready)

-Added Kethane and EPLP to the mod list

Hope to see you on the server!

- Kvick

I know this is old but I run a Kerbal darkmultiplayer server and still trying to set things up how I want. how exactly do you set a server to PVP or is there a way to lock ships so other players can't use them?
